backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder for future backend functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: 3D logo conversion in header and 3D motorcycle models in gallery, both using Three.js and React Three Fiber.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing component purposes, data structures, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for black background, white text, and red accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Karthikeyan Bike Sale application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the complete page layout with Header, HeroBanner, BikeGallery, ContactSection, and Footer components on a black background.
frontend/src/components/BikeCard.tsx: Bike card component displaying a 3D motorcycle model, bike specifications, price, and enquiry button with hover effects and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/BikeGallery.tsx: Gallery section component rendering a responsive grid of BikeCard components with title, description, and decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/BikeModel3D.tsx: React Three Fiber component rendering a 3D motorcycle model with color customization, auto-rotation animation, interactive OrbitControls, and metallic materials.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact information section displaying phone number, Instagram handle, and showroom address in a three-column grid with call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header component with 3D rotating logo, branding text, phone number, and Instagram handle with responsive design and backdrop blur.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Full-viewport hero section with background image, bold branding text, call-to-action buttons, and smooth scroll functionality to gallery.
frontend/src/components/Logo3D.tsx: React component that renders a 3D rotating cylindrical logo using React Three Fiber, with a texture-mapped metallic surface and ambient/directional lighting.
frontend/src/data/bikes.ts: Defines the Bike interface and exports an array of three sport bike models with specifications (engine, power, weight) and image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider for ICP, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file intended for future React Query hooks when backend functionality is implemented.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a dark-themed color palette using OKLCH color space, including sidebar, chart, and UI component colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking two completed features: converting the header logo and bike gallery cards to 3D rendered elements using Three.js and React Three Fiber.
